name: WordPress Login Styles
author: Arnab Kumar Halder

sections.description:
WordPress Login Styles is a login style plugin. This plugin will adds an awesome login screen in your wordpress login. You can select login theme style & others color customization by using the options of this plugin.

Wanna see how it works? Click here: http://etwoz.hostingsiteforfree.com/wp-login.php?redirect_to=http%3A%2F%2Fetwoz.hostingsiteforfree.com%2Fwp-admin%2F&reauth=1
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload wp-login-styles to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now go to Wp Login optins menu `Dashboard>> under Settings menu
  4. Now choose your settings click into save and logout and see the changes…..
  5. For Better Documention Buy a pro version…
sections.faq:
How do I install this plugin?

You can install as others regular wordpress plugin. No different way. Please see on installation tab.

short_description: Wordpress Login Styles is an awesome, super lightweight plugin for your wordpress website
